hero.subtitle: From AI-powered crisis support to confidential counseling sessions, we're building a comprehensive digital platform that understands the unique mental health challenges faced by Indian college students.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.heading: Mental Health Crisis in Higher Education
items: Rising anxiety and depression among students
Stigma preventing students from seeking help

cards.title: AI-Powered Support
cards.description: Immediate crisis intervention and personalized coping strategies available 24/7.

cards.title: Anonymous Counseling
cards.description: Complete privacy protection with professional counselors who understand student life.

cards.title: Learning Resources
cards.description: Comprehensive mental health education in multiple Indian languages.

cards.title: Peer Community
cards.description: Connect with fellow students in moderated, supportive environments.

cards.title: Analytics Dashboard
cards.description: Help institutions understand and improve mental health support systems.

cards.title: Cultural Understanding
cards.description: We understand Indian family dynamics, academic pressure, and cultural values that impact mental health.

cards.title: Campus Integration
cards.description: Seamlessly works with your college systems, academic calendar, and existing support structures.

cards.title: Real Human Connection
cards.description: Direct access to local counselors and mental health professionals who understand your context.

cards.title: Data-Driven Care
cards.description: Anonymous insights help institutions improve support while protecting your privacy completely.

cards.title: Accessible to All
cards.description: Affordable, inclusive, and multilingual platform designed for broad accessibility.

header.subtitle: AI-powered support, professional counseling, and wellness resources designed specifically for students' mental health needs.

ai.title: AI-Powered Mental Health Support
features: Voice and text-based emotional support sessions
Real-time mood tracking and wellness insights
Personalized coping strategies and breathing exercises

resources.title: Interactive Wellness Resources
items: Guided breathing exercises with calming videos
Interactive yoga sessions for stress relief
Meditation audio library with nature sounds
Visual wellness illustrations and mood boards

assess.title: AI Counseling & Assessment
items: Voice-enabled AI counselor with natural conversations
Crisis detection and immediate support routing

crisis.title: Crisis Intervention Services
features: AI-powered crisis detection and immediate response
Safety planning with personalized coping strategies

tech.title: Advanced Technology Integration
items: Voice-enabled therapy sessions with natural conversation
Real-time sentiment analysis and mood tracking
Personalized content recommendations based on needs

privacy.title: Complete Privacy
items: Anonymous support with secure data handling
